message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this point. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product, considering its value to me. What do you think?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $10,500. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your offer, I'm willing to make a counteroffer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
